description: People are allowed to interact with the members of one other home from Saturday, the States say.
title: Coronavirus: Guernsey households to expand 'bubbles'
title_page: Coronavirus: Guernsey households to expand 'bubbles' - BBC News
maintext: Mrs Soulsby said: "Whatever we do now it's going to be difficult because we're going to have to make decisions in order to ease out gently.
